scripts.syncToStartupScripts: source .env && aws s3 sync startup-scripts s3://$STARTUP_SCRIPTS_BUCKET_NAME --delete
scripts.syncFromStartupScripts: source .env && aws s3 sync s3://$STARTUP_SCRIPTS_BUCKET_NAME startup-scripts
scripts.syncToLetsEncrypt: source .env && aws s3 sync nginx-image/letsencrypt s3://$LETS_ENCRYPT_BUCKET_NAME
scripts.syncFromLetsEncrypt: source .env && aws s3 sync s3://$LETS_ENCRYPT_BUCKET_NAME nginx-image/letsencrypt
